queries.name: Get User
queries.query: query GetUser($id: ID!) { user(id: $id) { id name email } }

mutations.name: Create User
mutations.query: mutation CreateUser($input: CreateUserInput!) { createUser(input: $input) { id name email } }

mutations.name: Update User
mutations.query: mutation UpdateUser($id: ID!, $input: UpdateUserInput!) { updateUser(id: $id, input: $input) { id name email } }
